text: The Ford Galaxy is a car produced by Ford Motor Company from 1995 to the present day. The original model was made by Volkswagen. It was also sold as the Volkswagen Sharan and Seat Alhambra. It got a facelift in 2000. It was redesigned in 2006 made by Ford themselves. The third generation was unveiled in 2014. As of 2014 there have been three generations. It was discontinued with the Ford S-Max in 2023. File:Ford Galaxy - first generation.jpg|First Generation File:Ford Galaxy (II, Facelift) – Frontansicht, 3. title: Ford Galaxy
